members.comment: Constructs an exception with the specified detail message.

param: s - the detail message, which should include the name of the file attempting to be opened; may be null

name: javax.annotation.processing.FilerException
comment: Indicates a Filer detected an attempt to open a file that would violate the guarantees provided by the Filer. Those guarantees include not creating the same file more than once, not creating multiple files corresponding to the same class or interface or package, and not creating files for classes or interfaces with invalid names.
